title: The next League band
body:
If you were forming another band with League champions (e.g. Pentakill), what would be its name, who would be in it, and what would they play?

My idea is: **VOID PISTOLS** featuring Vel'Koz on drums, Kog'Maw on guitar, Kha'Zix on bass, Cho'Gath on piano, and Rek'Sai on vocals.


I'm looking forward to seeing what bands you come up with!

Cheers,

Brandon

How about a rap group modeled after 90s hip hop?

For the hip hop band... you could have **Mcee mad dawg nasus, dr draven and lil jinx**... or something!  Idk i think it would be really fun to have some type skin like these.

EDIT: Whoops! I'm a newb and still learning the boards, so that deleted post of mine contained the same text above -- I accidentally embedded it as a reply to one post, instead sharing it as its own reply, so I remade it.
